mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , COUNT(*) OVER() TOT_CNT , A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
mapper.select: SELECT A.SVC_ID , A.SVC_NM FROM TB_SVC A INNER JOIN TB_STO_SVC B ON A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SVC_NM

WITH DATE_RANGE AS (
SELECT TO_DATE(CASE WHEN(MIN_DT > START_DT) THEN MIN_DT ELSE START_DT END, 'YYYYMMDD') START_DT , TO_DATE(CASE WHEN (MAX_DT < END_DT) THEN MAX_DT ELSE END_DT END, 'YYYYMMDD') END_DT FROM ( SELECT START_DT , END_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(START_DT, 1, 6) || '01'), 'RRRRMMDD') AS MIN_DT , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(END_DT, 1, 6) || '01', 'RRRRMMDD' )),'YYYYMMDD') AS MAX_DT FROM ( SELECT #{START_DT} AS START_DT , #{END_DT} AS END_DT FROM DUAL ) ) ) SELECT USER_NM, USER_ID, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+0 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D01, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+1 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D02, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+2 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D03, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+3 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D04, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+4 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D05, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+5 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D06, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+6 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D07, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+7 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D08, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+8 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D09, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+9 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D10, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+10, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D11, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+11, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D12, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+12, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D13, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+13, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D14, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+14, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D15, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+15, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D16, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+16, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D17, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+17, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D18, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+18, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D19, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+19, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D20, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+20, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D21, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+21, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D22, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+22, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D23, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+23, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D24, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+24, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D25, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+25, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D26, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+26, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D27, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+27, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D28, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+28, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D29, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+29, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D30, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN DECODE(TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+30, 'DD'), '31', TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+30, 'DD')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D31 FROM TB_MOB_EVENT_LOG T1, DATE_RANGE T3 WHERE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM,'RRRRMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT, 'RRRRMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(T3.END_DT, 'RRRRMMDD') AND T1.USER_NM IS NOT NULL
AND T1.SVC_ID = ${SVC_ID}
AND T1.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{USER_ID} || '%'
AND T1.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{USER_NM} || '%'
GROUP BY USER_NM, USER_ID

WITH DATE_RANGE AS (
SELECT TO_DATE(CASE WHEN(MIN_DT > START_DT) THEN MIN_DT ELSE START_DT END, 'YYYYMMDD') START_DT , TO_DATE(CASE WHEN (MAX_DT < END_DT) THEN MAX_DT ELSE END_DT END, 'YYYYMMDD') END_DT FROM ( SELECT START_DT , END_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(START_DT, 1, 6) || '01'), 'RRRRMMDD') AS MIN_DT , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(END_DT, 1, 6) || '01', 'RRRRMMDD' )),'YYYYMMDD') AS MAX_DT FROM ( SELECT #{START_DT} AS START_DT , #{END_DT} AS END_DT FROM DUAL ) ) ) SELECT TO_CHAR(REG_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD') REG_DT , COUNT(1) CNT FROM TB_MOB_EVENT_LOG T1, DATE_RANGE T3 WHERE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM,'RRRRMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT, 'RRRRMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(T3.END_DT, 'RRRRMMDD') AND T1.USER_NM IS NOT NULL
AND T1.SVC_ID = ${SVC_ID}
AND T1.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{USER_ID} || '%'
AND T1.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{USER_NM} || '%'
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(REG_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ORDER BY REG_DT ASC

WITH DATE_RANGE AS (
SELECT TO_DATE(CASE WHEN(MIN_DT > START_DT) THEN MIN_DT ELSE START_DT END, 'YYYYMMDD') START_DT , TO_DATE(CASE WHEN (MAX_DT < END_DT) THEN MAX_DT ELSE END_DT END, 'YYYYMMDD') END_DT FROM ( SELECT START_DT , END_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(START_DT, 1, 6) || '01'), 'RRRRMMDD') AS MIN_DT , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(END_DT, 1, 6) || '01', 'RRRRMMDD' )),'YYYYMMDD') AS MAX_DT FROM ( SELECT #{START_DT} AS START_DT , #{END_DT} AS END_DT FROM DUAL ) ) ) SELECT USER_NM, USER_ID, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+0 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D01, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+1 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D02, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+2 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D03, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+3 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D04, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+4 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D05, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+5 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D06, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+6 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D07, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+7 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D08, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+8 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D09, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+9 , 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D10, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+10, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D11, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+11, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D12, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+12, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D13, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+13, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D14, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+14, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D15, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+15, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D16, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+16, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D17, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+17, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D18, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+18, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D19, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+19, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D20, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+20, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D21, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+21, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D22, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+22, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D23, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+23, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D24, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+24, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D25, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+25, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D26, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+26, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D27, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+27, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D28, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+28, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D29, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+29, 'DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D30, SUM(CASE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM, 'DD') WHEN DECODE(TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+30, 'DD'), '31', TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT+30, 'DD')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) D31 FROM TB_MOB_EVENT_LOG T1, DATE_RANGE T3 WHERE TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DTTM,'RRRRMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(T3.START_DT, 'RRRRMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(T3.END_DT, 'RRRRMMDD') AND T1.USER_NM IS NOT NULL
AND T1.SVC_ID = ${SVC_ID}
AND T1.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{USER_ID} || '%'
AND T1.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{USER_NM} || '%'
GROUP BY USER_NM, USER_ID
